changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.subTitle: Change and modify the existing password

validations.empty: Current password is a required field
New password is a required field
Confirm password is a required field

submitSuccess.description: The password has been changed successfully

invalidCurrentPassword.description: The current password you entered appears to be invalid. Please try again

genericError.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

confirmationModal.heading: Confirmation
confirmationModal.message: Changing the password will result in the termination of the current session. You will have to login with the newly changed password. Do you wish to continue?

consentRevokeModal.heading: Revoke {{appName}}?
consentRevokeModal.message: Are you sure you want to revoke this consent? This operation is not reversible.

description.piiCategoryHeading: Information that you've shared with the application

consentedAppsFetchGenericError.description: Couldn't load the list of consented applications.

consentReceiptFetchGenericError.description: Couldn't load information on the selected application.

revokeConsentedAppSuccess.description: The consent has been successfully revoked for the application.

revokeConsentedAppGenericError.description: Couldn't revoke consent for the application.

updateConsentedClaimsSuccess.description: The consented claims have been successfully updated for the application.

updateConsentedClaimsGenericError.description: The consented claims failed to update for the application.

success.description: The required security questions were added successfully.

error.message: Error occurred while configuring the security questions

success.description: The required security questions were updated successfully.

error.message: Error occurred while updating the security questions

securityQuestions.noConfiguration: No security questions configured for this user

userProfile.subTitle: Manage information about you, your sub profiles and your account in general.

success.description: The required user profile details are downloaded successfully.

error.description: Error occurred while downloading the user profile details.

success.description: The required user profile details are retrieved successfully.

error.description: Error occurred while retrieving the profile details.

success.description: The required user profile details were successfully updated.

userSessions.title: Sessions
userSessions.subTitle: This is a list of devices that have been active on your account, or are currently signed in.

genericError.description: Something went wrong while revoking user sessions.
Something went wrong while revoking the user session.

emptySessionList.heading: There are no active sessions for this user

revokeAllUserSessionsModal.heading: Confirmation
revokeAllUserSessionsModal.message: This action will log you out of all the sessions on every device. Do you wish to continue?

revokeUserSessionModal.heading: Confirmation
revokeUserSessionModal.message: This action will log you out of the session on the particular device. Do you wish to continue?

unrecognizedWarning.header: Revoke any sessions that you don't recognize.
